ComicInfo.Title: Getting Into Weirdo; Laugh Makers (Second of a Series); Helen Hippo the Trippy Hippy; Uncle Bob's Mid-Life Crisis; The Siamese Fiendlings; Gold Is Whar' Ya Find It, Chapter 5: Nicky's Doom; The Penis Pet Show; The Life-Cycle of an Artist; C.P. Grimsley; More Fine Art; Gold Is Whar' Ya Find It, Chapter 8: Hijack!; Gold Is Whar' Ya Find It, Chapter 7: Sapped Saps; Gold Is Where You Find It, Chapter 6: The Trip

ComicInfo.Summary:
The trials of creating for Weirdo
False biographical oddities about comedians
How Helen was transformed into a hippo.
Crumb has a mid-life crisis.
Evil siamese twins run riot
Axel's truck is hijacked.
Peter is placed in a penis contest pet show.
Much ado about banned chocolate
How others see Dori
How to develop breasts
Twelve assorted bizarre images in Kaz's unique style.
Weird creatures despair
